meanings.definition: A person who owns and lives on a homestead.
meanings.sent1: The homesteader built a cozy cabin on his land.
meanings.sent2: The homesteader tended to his crops every morning.
meanings.sent3: The homesteader joked that his chickens were the real rulers of the homestead.
meanings.sent4: The homesteader was the king of his little kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The homesteader's life revolved around his home and farm.

meanings.definition: A person who settles on and cultivates land as a homestead.
meanings.sent1: Every homesteader dreams of a bountiful harvest.
meanings.sent2: The homesteader planted seeds in neat rows in the soil.
meanings.sent3: The homesteader's dog thought it was the real homesteader of the house.
meanings.sent4: The homesteader's dedication to the land was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The homesteader's hands were calloused from hard work in the fields.

meanings.definition: A person who is a resident of a homestead.
meanings.sent1: The homesteader greeted visitors with a warm smile.
meanings.sent2: Every homesteader knew the land like the back of their hand.
meanings.sent3: The homesteader's cat thought it was the true owner of the homestead.
meanings.sent4: The homesteader's heart belonged to the peaceful countryside.
meanings.sent5: The homesteader's presence brought life to the once-empty homestead.
